name: RobotScout
description:
You play as a little robot who can use different components to get to and charge the teleporter at the end of each floor. However each component uses up your energy and running out of energy means game over. Will you have enough energy? Will you find your way out? Will you be the Roboscout?

1/02/21

I finished the tutorial at least. WOO!

Press 1 to fire the laser.

So, I was rushing to finish the endless mode for the FFF jam. But was having unforeseen bugs with the enemies and doors so I disabled it from the main menu. it was still accessible from the tutorial win screen however.

1/02/21 20:45pm - 1.2 builds uploaded, these just unlock endless mode which I tried and failed to hide. This version does not contain enemies or doors which were bugged
